latestPosts.caption:
Two years after India’s largest FMCG company Hindustan Unilever Ltd (HUL) appointed Rohit Jawa as the MD and CEO, the company has now named Priya Nair as its new CEO after Jawa decided to step down to pursue the "next chapter" in his life.

Read more: LINK in bio

#HUL #RohitJawa #PriyaNair #HindustanUnilever
latestPosts.alt: Photo shared by Fortune India on July 10, 2025 tagging @thesouravm. May be an image of 1 person, standing and text that says 'F HUL CEO shake-up: Rohit Jawa steps down 2 years into 5-year term, Priya Nair named successor fortuneindia.com'.

OpenAI to launch web browser to take on Google Chrome: Report

After disrupting the tech world with its AI chatbot, ChatGPT, OpenAI is expected to launch an AI-powered web browser in the coming weeks that will take on Alphabet's Google Chrome, Reuters reported.

Pic: Getty Images

👉 Read more 🔗 Link in bio.

#openai #browser #googlechrome

latestPosts.caption:
🚨 First look at the new Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 from Galaxy Unpacked in Brooklyn!

Samsung’s most stylish foldable just got a major glow-up. The Flip 7 now features a bigger Flex Window external display, a near-invisible crease on the main screen, and under the hood, it’s driven by Samsung’s new 3nm processor and packs multi-modal AI for smarter, more seamless experiences.

This AI pocket powerhouse isn’t just a fashion-forward phone—it’s a power-packed companion for life on the go.

@theaayushailawadi with all the details.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
#GalaxyZFlip7 #GalaxyUnpacked #Flip7 #Samsung #TechNews

🚨 First look at the new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 from Galaxy Unpacked in Brooklyn!

Samsung has blended its best-selling S25 Ultra with its flagship foldable to create a thinner, lighter, and more powerful Z Fold. Now with an 8-inch inner display, a wider outer screen, and a 200MP main camera—this feels like a true all-in-one device.

Samsung’s 7th-gen foldable is smarter, sleeker, and a serious contender for your main phone.

@theaayushailawadi with all the details.

🚨 Happy 150th birthday to BSE India — Asia’s oldest stock exchange!

From trades under a banyan tree in the 1850s to launching Sensex and BOLT, BSE has been a cornerstone of India’s financial journey since 1875.

Here's a quick look at its iconic milestones. 

For more news & updates, visit 🔗 Link in bio!

latestPosts.caption:
🎙️ “It’s not just about age, but impact.” 

Go behind the scenes with the Fortune India editorial team as they unpack how the 40 Under 40 issue came together. Also read about why Gen Z’s workplace behaviour is shaking up traditional norms, how “banks are becoming more human,” and why “Indian fashion is no longer just a Diwali purchase.” 

Catch the ideas and insights that shaped the Fortune India 40 Under 40 July issue on our YouTube channel!
